FPS to be done.about: To choose the next FPS to do !

Coop to be done.about: To choose the next coop game to do with Willy !

Turn Based to be done.about: To choose the next turn based to do !

Others RPG to be done.about: To choose the next RPG ( except classical FPS or turn based ) to do ! Can be arcade, card game, hack n slash...

Romance VN to be done.about: To choose the next Romance VN to be done ( romance is part of the game and not just for scening purpose )

Female Focus VN to be done.about: To choose the next Romance VN to be done where the MC is a woman ( romance is part of the game and not just for scening purpose )

Classic VN to be done.about: To choose the next classic VN to be done ( romance is part of the game and not just for scening purpose )

Others VN to be done.about: To choose the next Romance VN to be done out side female MC and Classic one ( romance is part of the game and not just for scening purpose )

VN No Story set.about: Missing story in a VN will lead to be not selected for next game

Strong story to be done.about: To choose the next strong story to read

Adult VN to be done (new).about: To choose the next new adult VN to be done ( all - no filtering )

Adult VN TBD Poly.about: Adult VN with polygamous approach ( harem )

Complete Adult VN to be done.about: To choose the next complete Adult VN to be done ( romance is part of the game and not just for scening purpose )

Test in progress or Tested.about: Waiting for completion but game has been updated since last play

EA - Adult VN (not tested yet).about: To choose the next in development adult VN to be done ( not already played pr done )
EA - Adult VN (not tested yet).description:
show isVNA and isDevInProgress
exclude isWaitUpdate and isWaitComplete

EA - update available.about: Game has been updated and can be continued

EA - wait completion - update available.about: Waiting for completion but game has been updated since last play

VNs - Alt Path to be done.about: VN available already started, done once but alternative route available

Adult VNs - Alt Path to be done.about: Adult VNs available already started, done once but alternative route available

Except VNs - Alt Path to be done.about: Game available already started, done once but alternative route/choice/skill selection available

Adult - Wait mod.about: game has been updated, waiting for mod

Steam deck - action.about: Action game that may be good for steam deck

in standby - VNAs.about: VNAs available already started, not in progress but not finished ( standby, alternative route, sequel, just launch once, ... )

in standby - VNs.about: VNs available already started, not in progress but not finished ( standby, sequel, just launch once, ... )

in standby - RPGs.about: RPGs already played but in standby ( to be restarted ... or not that is the question )

in standby - Others.about: game not fitting previous types and started but in standby ( not VN or RPG or Coop ) - Also include not classified games because without proper tagging , it's others

My wish list - RPGs.about: Wished RPGs ( available or in development )

My wish list - VNs.about: VN Wish listed ( ``PLATFORM/Wish`` ) for Available games ( Most expected and then 1 to undefined )

My wish list - Others.about: game not fitting previous types and wished ( not VN or RPG or Coop )

KickStarted.about: kickstarted game ( development still in progress )

Wish from review.about: game with good notation from 'home made review' that are candidate to be bought

Editors.about: All editors ( that have catch my interest ). Classified by type EDITOR/ and expectation for other game EDTLOVE/( GOOD, AVG, LOW ), comment tag is INFO

Done VNAs.about: VNAs done (at least 30% of the game before stopping)

Errors - Missing tags.about: Try to detected what is missing

Errors - Tag conflicts.about: Try to detected conflict between tags

contents.title: #WISH and #DONE ( should set to PLATFORM/WISH and only #WISH tag )
#WISH and #NEXT ( should set to PLATFORM/WISH and only #WISH tag )
TESTED and any tag for test is finished
#PLAY/TESTED and in to be done state

Long sheet (>60 lines).about: Game sheet is longer than 60 lines (only header is parsed for tags)

contentInProgressAndCompleteToBeDoneNotS.title: In progress
contentInProgressAndCompleteToBeDoneNotS.description:
| - show isInProgress ( 1st Play: not isDone / Re play )
 | - exclude isDevInProgress isToBeContinued
 | - And show by NEXT
